name: CrackTheHash1
description: You have 3 hashes and a short wordlist. Crack the hashest to form the flag.
author: Abdallah Mesleh
hint: John the ripper, or hashcat could be extremely useful! The format in John the Ripper is --format=Raw-MD4, In hashcat, to specify MD4, you can use -m 900! After cracking the passwords, append them to find the flag!
